prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sea creature with vibrant colors and unique patterns.
I want a Pokemon that has a playful and curious personality, featuring blue and green hues.
Generate a large, aquatic Pokemon inspired by a mollusk, complete with bright yellow accents.
Make a design for a medium-sized Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, showcasing its vibrant color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon with a distinctive body shape that is both charming and colorful, perfect for a kids' game.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique combination of aquatic and land features, with a focus on its colors.
Design a Pokemon that embodies a friendly demeanor, showcasing its colorful and lively appearance.
